Package uk.ac.gla.mir.flair.index

Provides classes for creating Flair Indexes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CollectionStatistics Title: CollectionStatistics
Description: Get the Collection Statistics from a given index
Company: Department of Computing Science, University of Glasgow
DirectIndex Title: DirectIndex
Description: Generates an abstract Direct Index
Company: Department of Computing Science, University of Glasgow
DocumentPositions Title: DocumentPositionsIndex
Description: Reads and Writes Document Positions to File
Company: Department of Computing Science, University of Glasgow
IdentifierDirectIndex Title: TextDirectIndex
Description: Generates a Identifier Direct Index.
Indexer Title: Indexer
Description: Builds Index Specs, Creates Indexes, Filter Chains and Indexes IRObjects
Company: Department of Computing Science, University of Glasgow
InvertedIndex Title: InvertedIndex
Description: Generates an abstract Inverted Index
Company: Department of Computing Science, University of Glasgow
PostingListEntry Title: PostingListEntry
Description: An Entry in the Posting List
Company: Department of Computing Science, University of Glasgow
TextInvertedIndex Title: TextInvertedIndex
Description: Generates a TextInverted Index
Company: Department of Computing Science, University of Glasgow
 

Package uk.ac.gla.mir.flair.index Description

Provides classes for creating Flair Indexes. To create new index types simply implement new IvertedIndex and DirectIndex classes.
